Package ar.com.hjg.pngj

Class Summary
ImageInfo Simple immutable wrapper for basic image info Some parameters are clearly redundant The constructor requires an 'ortogonal' subset
ImageLine Simple wrapper for an image scanline Can be (and usually is) reused while iterating over the image lines
